name: CDE - Common Desktop Environment
author: Bruno Rocha
description: A nostalgic theme inspired by the Common Desktop Environment (CDE) from classic Unix workstations. Features authentic CDE/Motif design with window-based layout, 3D beveled borders, and classic color schemes.

fediverse_verification.description: Enable Fediverse Username Verification by adding rel="me" to the user's profile URL

features: Floating window layout for blog posts
Multiple font support (MS fonts + Atkinson Hyperlegible)

customization.colors: Edit CSS custom properties in static/cde-style.css - includes full CDE color palette
customization.layout: Modify templates in templates/ directory for window arrangements
customization.content: Use Markdown fragments in content/ directory
customization.fonts: Interface uses Pixelated MS Sans Serif, content uses Atkinson Hyperlegible
